definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
at any time/at all times/at the right time
as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
conveniently/without extra trouble/while doing it/in passing

sentences.english: The change of organic acids in rice wine with the extension of fermentation time was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了江米酒中有机酸的成分及其随发酵时间的变化。

sentences.english: At last, the approach is supplemented according to the value leakage.
sentences.chinese: 最后针对价值漏损随实物期权的定价进行修正。

sentences.english: Roxarsone is excreted mostly as its parent drug in animal manure.
sentences.chinese: 洛克沙胂进入动物体后，大部分以原形随粪便排出。

sentences.english: In the stream were the flowers flowing.
Then there is the change in that charge over time, better known as current.
sentences.chinese: 然后是随时间而改变的电荷，就是我们知道的电流。

sentences.english: There are several relaxation mechanism according to different stimulated condition.
sentences.chinese: 随刺激条件不同而有多种弛豫机构。

sentences.english: The juice yield decreased with treating time postponed.
sentences.chinese: 出汁率随处理时间延迟而降低。

sentences.english: Damage increases as the attack is charged longer.
sentences.chinese: 攻击力随蓄力时间的增加而增加。

sentences.english: RESULTS The whole blood concentration of tacrolimus was gradually diminished with time after operation.
sentences.chinese: 结果他克莫司全血浓度随移植后时间延长而逐渐下降。

sentences.english: Degradation rate (DR) of chitosan in the hydrogels decreased with increase of SD.
sentences.chinese: 水凝胶中壳聚糖的降解速率随取代度的升高而降低。

sentences.english: The majority of British women adopt their husband's surname when they marry.
sentences.chinese: 大多数英国女性结婚后随夫姓。

sentences.english: Cooperative life-styles also differ according to the environment .
sentences.chinese: 集体的生活风格也随环境的不同而不同。

sentences.english: Diameter distribution of tree stratum reveals truncated normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 乔木层株数随胸径分布呈现截尾正态分布。

sentences.english: While they are visible, they move with the cursor.
sentences.chinese: 可见时，这类工具提示可以随光标移动。

sentences.english: The velocity and desorption extent of mercury are enhanced with the increase of leaching time and quantity.
sentences.chinese: 土壤汞解吸量随淋滤时间和淋滤量的增加而增大。

sentences.english: Other things being equal, the evapotranspiration rate decreases with increasing humidity.
sentences.chinese: 当其它条件相同时，蒸散率随湿度增大而减小。

definition: to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
